game.title: Meridian: Frontier
game.description: Meridian: Frontier is a story-driven 'lite-survival' base-building adventure game with a unique low-poly Â¾ view style and deep, systemic gameplay. Explore a futuristic sci-fi underground world to mine and prospect for the valuable resources you need to build up your mining colony.
game.history: After leaving the AAA games industry, Alex's first project of his own always had to be a sci-fi survival game. Inspired both by classics like Lego Rock Raiders and modern survival gems like Subnautica, Meridian: Frontier is a love letter to story-driven singleplayer exploration, built around compelling physics-based gathering and base-building features.

features.feature: Stylised low-poly, high-fidelity graphics powered by Unreal Engine 5.
Mine and prospect for resources in a compelling, physics-based, futuristic sci-fi world.
Build up a mining colony - construct buildings and facilities, acquire new plans and decorate with extensive cosmetic options.
'Lite-survival' gameplay. No food or drink to manage, but the planet is a hostile environment and it won't be easy to make your fortune.
Deep, story-driven exploration - follow in the boot-prints of a previous expedition and navigate a world of dystopian ultra-capitalism.
Riveting narrative and world-building driven by themes of corporate greed and the hope of a fresh start.
Mine, collect, prospect, refine and craft a huge amount of resources, items and tools.
Upgrade your tools and mining suit to unlock new abilities and improve your efficiency.
Fully voice-acted and featuring an original 'space-celtic' soundtrack.
